name: dispossess
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to take property, especially buildings or land, away from someone or a group of people: be dispossessed of A lot of people were dispossessed of their homes during the civil war. Compare
repossess

dispossession

to force someone to give up the possession of a house, land, or other property: Many people were dispossessed of their homes during the war.
